eya yali yatha thaththwayata pathwimata miniththu 45ka kalayak gathawu athara ee wanawita tharagaya athahara damimata sanwidhayakayan thiranaya kara thibini.me sambandhawa hambanthota shaks krida samajaye sabhapathi palath sabha manthri johan pranandu mahathagen ‘dinamina’ kala wimasumakadi ee mahatha kiya sitiye mewara tharagawaliye thama kandayama sahabhagi wana palamu tharagaya mese athahara damimata siduwima kanagatudayaka karunak bawaya.tharagaya pawathwuye nam itha honda tharagayak narambaimata kridalolinta awasthawa udawimata thibu bawath johan pranandu mahatha pawasiya.nawatha tharagaya pawathwena dinaya idiriye di tharaga sanwidhayaka kamituwa wisin thiranaya karanu athi bawath, ema tharagaya boho wita tharagawaliye awasan bhagaye di pawathwenu athi bawath ragar sangamaye lekam risli ilyas mahatha prakasha kaleya.yuda hamudawata thiyunu jayakme athara yuda hamuda pila ha polis kandayama athara diyagama di pawathi tharagayen lakunu 15-14ka thiyunu jayak wartha kirimata yuda hamudawa samathwiya.
